seed_pair.target: Ella dijo que necesita leer el mismo libro.
seed_pair.known: She said that she needs to read the same book.

seed_pair.target: Él dijo que no necesita caminar a la escuela.
seed_pair.known: He said that he doesn't need to walk to school.

seed_pair.target: Esa estudiante tiene las dos manos arriba.
seed_pair.known: That student has both of her hands up.

seed_pair.target: Creo que necesita considerar diez problemas posibles.
seed_pair.known: I think that he needs to consider ten possible problems.

seed_pair.target: No creo que necesite vender la compañía.
seed_pair.known: I don't think that she needs to sell the company.
Do you think that she needs to offer another way?
Yes I think she ought to.

seed_pair.target: No, no creo que sea muy importante.
seed_pair.known: No I don't think it's very important.
